item.title: Quick queston
item.dc:creator: @rjj95 rjj95
item.description:
@rjj95 wrote:

I am using a cheat cleint messing around with it, I was wondering how would i make a fake packet to send a blue partyhat to the bank?
I have this code:

else if (text.startsWith("::phat")) { // 87 drop item Stream.createFrame(59); Stream.writeDWord(1); Stream.writeDWord(1042); //itemid Stream.writeDWord(1); //amount
And i know I have to change the packet I think?

Read full topic
